About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I am Angelo Cabañero Dedicatoria, 27 years of age, born in Mangagoy Bislig City and currently residing in Mintal Davao City. Son of Mr. and Mrs. Dedicatoria, sibling of 2 brothers and 3 sisters. I graduated last March 2016, with the degree of Bachelor of Science in Computer Science. I am Passionate of making useful applications and persevere of becoming more knowledgeable about new technologies. Aiming high to contribute good things in the society.
